nodes.text: Stabinator was a Mark VII Gladiator Droid who worked for the Grakkus Arena around 0 ABY. Stabinator was manumitted after a slave uprising instigated by Wrollanppf. The droid later recounted the happenings in an interview included in Maz Kanata's Smuggler's Guide.
Stabinator was first mentioned in Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, a book written by Daniel Wallace and released in 2018.
